greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest positive integer of the form (m!+n)/n.
link: Jinyuan Wang, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..456
formula: a(n) = A007672(n) + 1. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Dec 09 2014
mathematica: a = {}; Do[m = 1; While[ ! IntegerQ[m!/n], m++ ]; AppendTo[a, (m! + n)/n], {n, 1, 50}]; a
results.author: _Artur Jasinski_, Apr 11 2008
